title: Glottography dataset derived from Denevan 1966 "The aboriginal cultural geography of the Llanos de Mojos of Bolivia"
description: This datasets provides the approximate ranges of Indian tribes of Northeastern Bolivia at about 1700 AD as depicted in Fig. 3 in Denevan 1996.
citation: Denevan, William M. 1966. The aboriginal cultural geography of the Llanos de Mojos of Bolivia. (Ibero-Americana, 48.) Berkeley: University of California Press.
